action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:

action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a spacious room with wooden desks and chairs arranged in rows. The room has large windows on one side, offering a view of greenery outside. The floor is wooden, and there are hanging lights from the ceiling.

ANSWER: The room has wooden desks and chairs arranged in rows, large windows on one side, wooden flooring, and hanging lights from the ceiling.
action.label: response

answer: the room has wooden desks and chairs arranged in rows, large windows on one side, wooden flooring, and hanging lights from the ceiling

ESCAPE
